actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to provide for the prohibition of snow machines within the boundaries of the "Old Park" within the boundaries of Denali National Park and Preserve, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides that specified portions of Denali National Park and Preserve shall not be considered a conservation system unit for the purposes of special access by snowmachines pursuant to the Alaska National Interest Lands Conservation Act or implementing regulations.Revokes specified agency actions relating to the closure of portions of the Park and Preserve to snowmachine use.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the prohibition of snow machines within the boundaries of the "Old Park" within the boundaries of Denali National Park and Preserve, and for other purposes.
